example[0]: The house is up for sale.
example[1]: This week 14 of Campbell’s paintings were put up for auction.
example[2]: Even the most taboo subjects were up for discussion.
definition[1]: being considered for election or for a job
example[3]: Senator Frank Church was coming up for re-election that year.
example[4]: She is one of five candidates up for the chief executive’s job.
definition[2]: appearing in a court of law because you have been accused of a crime
example[5]: Ron’s up for drinking and driving next week.
definition[3]: willing to do something or interested in doing something
example[6]: We’re going to the pub later – are you up for it?
